text: University of South Carolina Upstate is a public university in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The university has about 4,608 students. It was founded in 1967. The current chancellor of the university is Bennie Harris. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Spartans. They have 13 varsity teams. They compete in the Atlantic Sun Conference. ==Other websites== *University of South Carolina Upstate's Official website *South Carolina Upstate Spartans' Official athletics website Category:Atlantic Sun Conference Category:Colleges and universities in South Carolina Category:1967 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in South Carolina
title: University of South Carolina Upstate
